programme.title: The Ballad Of Gregorio Cortez
programme.desc: Accused of murder in 1901 Texas, a Mexican-American farmer flees a large posse before he is finally captured.

programme.title: Red Headed Stranger
programme.desc: Revisionist western about fallen preacher Shay, who guns down his wife for running off with another man.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured.

programme.title: The Quick And The Dead
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger rides into a homesteading family's life when they are attacked by a ruthless gang.

programme.title: The Outsider
programme.desc: The story of an untraditional man, and the woman who dares to break every tradition by loving him.

programme.title: Barbarosa
programme.desc: A young cowboy hooks up with a legendary outlaw, and before long both are on the run from the law.

programme.title: Man From Music Mountain
programme.desc: Gene takes a hand at double-dealing in a desperate plan to beat a gang of crooks at their own game!

programme.title: Back In The Saddle
programme.desc: When pollution poisons hundreds of cattle, Gene Autry, faces trouble from all sides.

programme.title: Boots And Saddles
programme.desc: Foreman Gene Autry and his sidekick befriend a young Englishman who inherits a ranch.

programme.title: Larry McMurtry's Streets Of Laredo: Part 1
programme.desc: This third installment in the Lonesome Dove saga features Woodrow F. Call tracking down bandit Joey Garza.

programme.title: Larry McMurtry's Streets Of Laredo: Part 2
programme.desc: Woodrow F. Call, now a wizened bounty hunter, is hired to kill infamous young Mexican bandit Joey Garza.

programme.title: Larry McMurtry's Streets Of Laredo: Part 3
programme.desc: Wizened bounty hunter Woodrow F. Call is hired to track down the infamous young Mexican bandit Joey Garza.

programme.title: Larry McMurtry's Dead Man's Walk: Part 1
programme.desc: Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call join an ill-conceived effort to capture Santa Fe and annex New Mexico.

programme.title: Larry McMurtry's Dead Man's Walk: Part 2
programme.desc: Gus McCrae and Woodrow Call join an ill-conceived effort to capture Santa Fe and annex New Mexico.
